page.title: 10LANDSCAPE.
page.content: In a survey covering most of the High Street the following buildings were seen: 4 Toy Shops,10 Food Stores,1 Amusement Arcade,6 Clothing Shops,7 Gift Shops,3 Newsagents,3 Jewellers,4 Building Societies,5 Cafes,5 Sweet Shops,3 Chemists,4 Banks,3 Pubs and 1 Library nearby.Also there are 2 Factories in the area.Most of the buildings in the High Street and at the Sea Front are for commercial use. The dominant style of architecture is Victorian with more modern styles used at the edges of the town.Most of the people are pleased with the style of building in the area.The best examples of Victorian buildings are now used as Hotels and Nursing Homes.The landscape is hilly with lots of fields separated by hedges.Next to the sea the land drops as steep cliffs.Many houses have attractive gardens.
